lu.uni.geko.weaver.scope
Class AdviceAndScopeResolver

java.lang.Object
  lu.uni.geko.weaver.scope.AdviceAndScopeResolver

public final class AdviceAndScopeResolver
extends Object

Utility class for resolving the advice elements that represent base elements together with their advice instantiation scopes from advice models.

See Also:
Advice, AdviceInstantiationScope

Constructor Summary
private AdviceAndScopeResolver()
          Utility classes should not have a public or default constructor.
 
Method Summary
static Advice resolveAvAndInstantiationScopes(org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI avMURI)
          Resolves the elements of the advice model at the given URI that represent base model elements together with their advice instantiation scopes.

Method Detail

resolveAvAndInstantiationScopes

public static Advice resolveAvAndInstantiationScopes(org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI avMURI)
Resolves the elements of the advice model at the given URI that represent base model elements together with their advice instantiation scopes.

Parameters:
avMURI - the URI of an advice model
Returns:
the advice encapsulating elements and their scope
